handDesc.p: Halantas. Final N (l3 bhagavaN) is a simplified but full-sized na with a slightly elongated vertical stem and no headmark.

Original punctuation marks. The opening symbol is a circle slightly smaller than a character body, with a slightly curved vertical line (resembling an opening parenthesis) placed in it, extending from a point slightly below the circle's centre to a point slightly above the circle's top.
Other palaeographic observations. Anusvāra is typically omitted, but where used (l5 and l12 jayasiṁga), it may be atop the next character.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.head: Plates
div.p:
svasti+. śrīmatā+ṁ sakala-bhuvana-sa+ṁstūyamāna-mānavya-sago
tra!āṇa!āṁ hāriti-putra!āṇā+ṁ sapta-loka-mātri!!r̥bhir mma!ā+tr̥bhiḫ parip(ā)li
ta!āHOLEna!ā+ṁ svāmi-+mahāsena-pāda!ānudhyātānā+ṁ bhagavaN-nāri$āyaṇa-vara
-praHOLEsāda-sama!āsa!ādita-varāha-lāñcchanānā+ṁ [+Aśvamedhāvabhr̥tha-]sna!āna-pavitra!īkri!!r̥
ti!a-vapuṣā+ṁ caḷukyānā+ṁ kulam alaṁkariṣṇo+ḥ śrī-jayasiṁga!!ha-val+la
bha-maha!āra!ājasya priya-tanaya-śrī-viṣṇuvarddhana-maha!āra!ājasya

ri!īHOLE-pu+ṁja-pi!ṁjarita-pa!āda-padma-yugaḷ!!laḥ Ari-timira-nikarāpa(?v)i

mya-samādhita-viṣamasiddhi+ḥ merur iva bhuvana!āla+ṁbana+ḥ A!ākha
ṇḍala Ivaiyya!!aiśvaryyaSOMETHING?? vaiśravaṇa śri!ī-ja+yasiṁg!!ha val+lab!bha-maha!āra!āja-putra-viṣa

+rmmaṇi!a+ḥ putra!āya ku(?dg)iśa+rmmaṇa!e veda-veda!ā+ṁga-vide ṣaḍ-a+ṁga-vi+de ṣa(ṭ)-ka+rmma
-niHOLEratāya ka!ā+rttika-ma!āse candra-grahaṇa-ni+mitte dattaṁ vara(nā)ṇḍu-viṣa
ye HOLE paṇḍimuBELOWku nāma gra!āme paścimata+ḥ+. p(ūDUCTUS)rvva-diṣi ?M Akula(v)r̥(?ddha)+.
dakṣiṇataḥ meḻuru nāma grāme pan(?thDUCTUS)a!āḥ+. paścimata+ḥ meḻuru-si!ī
ma+ṁta(?ḥ) si!īma{ma}+. Ut+tarataḥ valmi!īka+ḥ+. Ete+ṣāṁ madhye dva!ādaśa-khaṇḍika-ko

ha!āra+ṁ+. grāma-madhye gr̥ha-st!thāna paścitatoṇḍa(M/ra/||) Aṇati!!ājñaptiḥ samu(?kha)!!sva-mukhaṁ

Iṟlakāveṟuguvarusamatiboḷumu visaboḷumu paṇḍ(i)
mukuna raṭṭoṟnu puṇya sāṟnu vanṟiboḷumu Iṇḍāṟu diniki sa
kṣmiHOLE Aḷugarālandhāru viṣaya be(?ḷa)(ko)(?ṇḍi)sida(?M) lakṣmaṇa
śaraṇalaya likhitaM

Reported in 7A/1916-1715 with description at 113-11420. I am not aware of a previous published edition. The present edition by Dániel Balogh is based on photographs taken by myself in 2023 at the Telangana State Archaeology Museum, Hyderabad.
